column4: loaded the new 7.4 and it comes up with the error crocode5.fw not available or load failed
hey i got one for you Nubbie...if you have a moment.
I start ubuntu and it comes up with failed to start the Xserver ( your graphical interface  its like that its not set up correctly.. ..
can any one walk me threw this
Is this on the LiveCD or the actual install?
use -phigh and it will ask a lot fewer questions
You can scroll up and down
AFIK the identifier can be whatever you want
Like Nubbie said, just stick to the defaults
That just means you need bcm43xx-fwcutter
It will offer to download the firmware for your card, choose yes
You might need to restart network-manager
